mapper.select: select gugun_code from gugun where sido_code = #{sido_code} and gugun_name like #{gugun_name}
mapper.insert: insert into child_attraction ( attraction_name, category1, category2, category3, latitude, longitude, road_address, address, phone_number, homepage, closed_day, operating_time, nursing_room, stroller, kid_zone, free_parking, paid_parking, sido_name, sido_code, gugun_name, gugun_code, admission_fee ) values ( #{attraction_name}, #{category1}, #{category2}, #{category3}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{road_address}, #{address}, #{phone_number}, #{homepage}, #{closed_day}, #{operating_time}, #{nursing_room}, #{stroller}, #{kid_zone}, #{free_parking}, #{paid_parking}, #{sido_name}, #{sido_code}, #{gugun_name}, #{gugun_code}, #{admission_fee} );
